## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are checked before submitting -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows the project's code style guidelines (Biome format)
- [ ] Code passes all linters (Biome, Oxlint)
- [ ] No TypeScript errors
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] Changes are focused and atomic (single responsibility)
- [ ] No unnecessary dependencies added

### Git

- [ ] Commits follow Conventional Commits format
- [ ] PR title follows Conventional Commits format
- [ ] Branch is up to date with main
- [ ] No merge conflicts

### Documentation and Testing

- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is commented where necessary
- [ ] Tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Existing tests updated if needed
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed

### Security

- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] No sensitive information in code (API keys, credentials, etc.)
- [ ] Input validation added where needed
- [ ] Dependencies reviewed for security issues
